song.title: Kharismatron
song.info:
Composed for "Unreal Tournament"
Equipment used: Korg Polysix Korg DW-8000 Korg Trinity Alesis DMS Ensoniq SD-1
Guitar Stuff: Washburn G4 guitar Morley Wah MXR Distortion II Alesis 3630 comp/gate Marshall JMP-1 Mackie 8-bus Eq SPL Vitalizer mk2
Guitar uses C-tuning with low C string dropped to A#.
Event Electronics Gina used for sampling and Sound Forge for minor editing.
Guitar tracks recorded in Cakewalk Pro Audio.
All the rest done with Fast Tracker 2.
